comments.author: _act_
comments.body: I do not have a business to use crypto payment gateway for but I have used it to make transactions in the past. I think I have used 2 or 3 of them before. They are gateway and they process transactions as fast as possible. Out of all the ways to make transactions online, I prefer crypto payment processors, but I noticed that many foreign sites are not supporting it for people from my country and sometimes I have no option than to go for master virtual card which I will use bitcoin or other cryptocurrency to fund, but crypto payment processors are better and all you have to do is for the site to generate you an address to pay to through the help of the payment processor.
